content.rendered:
AqualisBraemar shared a booth with PRISM Risk and Safety Consultants at this year’s Oil & Gas Asia Exhibition at the Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre from 11 to 13 July 2017.  

Left to right: Phil Lenox (Director Asia Pacific), Phong Chong Hui (Principal Engineer), Cherry Lenox (Executive Secretary), Capt. Jelle De Vries (Marine Manager)

The OGA is now reportedly the biggest Oil & Gas event in the region and has been running since 1987. The exhibition attracted some 23,000 trade visitors with 2,000 participating companies from 60 countries.

AqualisBraemar were promoting their services to the many visitors while networking with other industry players.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar enters Malaysia
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 8 October 2015 – Offshore marine and engineering consultancy AqualisBraemar continues its rapid international expansion and opens an office in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Malaysia is the 14th country AqualisBraemar, which is part of Oslo-listed Aqualis ASA, enters after the company was established in 2013. “Malaysia holds substantial proven oil and…

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar opens office in Shanghai
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 2 May 2014 - Offshore marine and engineering consultancy AqualisBraemar continues its rapid global expansion plan and opens an office in Shanghai, China. Just twelve months after starting operations, AqualisBraemar has established 12 offices in nine countries worldwide. “China has a growing offshore oil and gas industry and a number…

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar to South Korea
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 2 July 2015 – Offshore marine and engineering consultancy AqualisBraemar is to open an office in Busan, South Korea, following increased demand for the company’s services. “Over the past few months we have received an increasing number of work requests from oil services companies, rig operators and the numerous offshore…

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar sets up office in Australia
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has set up an office in Perth, Western Australia, to support oil and gas developments in the Australasia region.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar completes Ichthys Venturer FPSO station keeping job
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 28 August 2017 – Marine and offshore engineering consultancy AqualisBraemar has successfully completed its position keeping role for the Ichthys Venturer FPSO which is now fully moored in Australian waters. On 14 August, operator INPEX announced that the Ichthys Venturer FPSO had arrived in Australian waters, 220 kilometres off the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar opens Taiwan office
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 11 April 2017 – Marine and offshore engineering consultancy AqualisBraemar, part of Oslo-listed Aqualis ASA, has opened up an office in Taiwan to support local offshore wind and oil and gas developments.
